input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Glitzhome 9' Pre-Lit Greenery Pine Cone Christmas Garland with Warm LED Lights (2-Pack'
  - Name='Northlight Colorado Spruce Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Outdoor Evergreen LED Light Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Pre Lit Outdoor Winter Evergreen Christmas Garlands'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Snowy Branch LED Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit LED Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='6ft Faux Winter Greenery Garlands with Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Lexington Fir 9ft Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Transpac Artificial Garland'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 3-Feet Pine Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights T1638'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 108'' in. Lighted Faux Garland'
  - Name='216'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit LED Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Pre-Lit Artificial Pine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='One Allium Way Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Colorado Spruce Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An artificial Christmas garland, but uses Colorado Spruce instead of pine or fir, possibly differing in branch style and texture.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Outdoor Evergreen LED Light Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Evergreen garland with LED lights suitable for outdoor use; likely similar in function and construction but unspecified type of greenery.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Pre Lit Outdoor Winter Evergreen Christmas Garlands
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit outdoor evergreen garland, similar in usage and lighting but possibly different branch type and decorations.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir garland from a known brand, likely similar in silhouette and construction to the Norwood Fir Garland, though possibly differing in decoration details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Snowy Branch LED Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is an LED tree, not a garland, so the product type and usage differ significantly despite some stylistic overlap.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit LED Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar in length, pre-lit LED Canadian Pine garland, aligning closely with the reference's construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit LED Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar in length, pre-lit LED Canadian Pine garland, aligning closely with the reference's construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6ft Faux Winter Greenery Garlands with Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar type of pre-lit garland but shorter length and the description lacks detail on branch type or decoration, lowering relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Lexington Fir 9ft Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length and fir garland, fulfilling the same core function but the brand and exact fir type differ from Norwood Fir.
Generic artificial garland listing without details about lighting, branch type, or length, resulting in moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 3-Feet Pine Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights T1638
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a pre-lit artificial Christmas tree, not a garland, differing significantly in product type and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 108'' in. Lighted Faux Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted faux garland of similar length, likely similar in function but lacks specificity on branch type or decoration.
Long lighted faux pine garland, similar in core material and lighting, but nearly twice the length of reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit LED Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate listing, highly relevant due to similar pine branch type, length, lighting, and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit LED Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate listing, highly relevant due to similar pine branch type, length, lighting, and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pre-Lit Artificial Pine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial pine garland, matching core product category and features closely, though length and other details not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: One Allium Way Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial garland useful for similar purposes, but less detail on branch type or construction lowers exact relevancy.
